name: gh_dashboard_filter
description: A simple filter for Github dashboards

scripts.start: browserify -d -e app.js -o dist/app.js -t [ babelify --stage 0 ] -p [ css-modulesify -o dist/app.css ]
scripts.watch: watchify -d -e app.js -o dist/app.js -t [ babelify --stage 0 ] -p [ css-modulesify -o dist/app.css ]

author: Tyler Hughes <iampbt@gmail.com>
